info.name: Facebook Cloud - 2019
info.description:
A continuation of the "Facebook Cloud" style that works with the current version of Facebook.

Features with this style:
- The blue cloud background
- A white frame around the content on the page for 
  (Not yet supported on Facebook pages)
- Profile pictures zoom out when you hover the cursor over them

The two previous style versions of which this is based:
https://userstyles.org/styles/63891/facebook-cloud-improved
https://userstyles.org/styles/113501/facebook-cloud-2015
